meaningMnemonic: <radical>Blood</radical> and <radical>hair</radical> and <radical>tofu</radical> make up the <kanji>populace</kanji>. Those are the three categories the entire populace fits into, anyway.
readingMnemonic: The entire <kanji>populace</kanji> deserves <reading>shoe</reading>s (しゅう). It's a basic thing all humans should have like flowing blood, hair (somewhere), and tofu to eat.
